abstract: Independent investigation determines that former Atlanta Hawks general manager Danny Ferry was not motivated by racial bias when he made statements that led to buyout of final two years of his contract.
lead_paragraph: An independent investigation determined that Danny Ferry was not motivated by racial bias when he made statements that led to the buyout of his contract.
snippet: An independent investigation determined that Danny Ferry was not motivated by racial bias when he made statements that led to the buyout of his contract.
